title: Customer Satisfaction Survey
description: Collect feedback from existing customers about their satisfaction levels, identify improvement areas, and measure overall experience.

intro.title: We Value Your Feedback
intro.description: Thank you for taking the time to complete this short survey. Your feedback helps us improve our products and services. This survey will take approximately 2-3 minutes to complete.

csat_rating.title: How satisfied are you with our service?
csat_rating.description: Please rate your overall satisfaction with our service.

open_feedback.title: Any additional feedback?
open_feedback.description: Please share any specific comments or suggestions about your experience.

feature_usage.title: Which features do you use most?
feature_usage.description: Select all features that you regularly use.

support_satisfaction.title: How satisfied were you with our support team?
support_satisfaction.description: Please rate your satisfaction with our customer support.

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: We appreciate your feedback. Your input helps us improve our products and services. If you have any urgent concerns, please contact our support team.
